content: 6.8/11 M10 Clean-Tec powder cartridges for DX 6 Collated Clean-Tec lead-free cartridges for use with DX 6 powder-actuated fastening tools ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Accessories for tools > Accessories for direct fastening- - - ### FEATURES:Features Free from lead and other heavy metals One cartridge color covering most key applications – simplifying inventory management Multi-purpose cartridge for use with the expanded on-tool energy settings on DX 6 powder-actuated fastening tools Clean combustion – less residue build-up inside tool, reducing downtime for cleaning and maintenance Greater efficiency – numbered strips help to ensure that no cartridges are wasted Applications Powder-actuated fastening on steel, concrete and sand-lime block ### TECHNICAL DATA: Storage temperature - min.: 41 °F Storage temperature - max.: 77 °F Product Class: Ultimate Technical Data | Cartridge color | Titanium | Storage temperature - min. | 41 °F | Storage temperature - max. | 77 °F | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2229029 - DX Cartridge 6,8/11 M10 BK black - Package Size 100 pc - 2229027 - DX Cartridge 6,8/11 M10 T titanium C-T - Package Size 100 pc - 2229028 - DX Cartridge 6,8/11 M10-X10 T titanium Bulk - Package Size 1000 pc
